courses.title: Introduction to AI
courses.content: Learn the basics of Artificial Intelligence, including history, applications, and key concepts.

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.content: Understand machine learning algorithms, supervised and unsupervised learning, and hands-on exercises.

courses.title: Deep Learning with Neural Networks
courses.content: Dive into deep learning techniques using neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and practical implementations.

courses.title: Natural Language Processing
courses.content: Explore NLP concepts including text processing, sentiment analysis, and language models.
